title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 25.5 - Immediate statement on tests to producers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 25.5 - Immediate statement on tests to producers

State Regulations

Each purchaser or receiver of milk from a producer shall, on written request, mail or deliver to the producer, immediately after the
tests are made, a written statement of the percentage of butterfat found to
have been contained in the sample or samples representing the milk delivered by
such producer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
25.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
